column3: Latest;Kompong Cham province: A fire destroyed 3 houses on January 14
column4: 2020 at 20:40 am in Boeung Deng village
column7: Kampong Cham province. No injuries have been reported and police used 3 fire trucks and 2 more were supplied from elsewhere.------A man named as Sin Deth
column8: a 31-year-old male from the village was arrested in connection with the fire. It is reported that he had been recently released from prison after being jailed for arson.------SOURCE: Fire and Rescue Department
